+ 1);
var isVideoTaskModuleEnabled = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.view_video_msft_task_module')); var isNonVideoTaskModuleEnabled = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.view_non_video_msft_task_module')); var isXframeEnabled = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('glide.set_x_frame_options')); var taskModuleHeight = gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.msft_task_module_height'); var taskModuleWidth = gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.msft_task_module_width');
var microsoftTeamsUtil = new VAMicrosoftTeamsUtil(); var activity = microsoftTeamsUtil.getOutboundActivity(payload); var attachment = new sn_va_teams.MSTeamsActivityAttachmentBuilder(); var adaptiveCardBuilder = new sn_va_teams.MSTeamsAdaptiveCardBuilder(); var card = {}; if (action.includes("youtube")) { var youtubeId = action.substring(action.indexOf("?v=")+3); var imageUrl = MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_IMAGE_LINK+youtubeId+MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_IMAGE_RESOLUTION;
/* * Task Module Deep link Syntax * https://teams.microsoft.com/l/task/APP_ID?url=<TaskInfo.url>&height=<TaskInfo.height>&width=<TaskInfo.width>&title=<TaskInfo.title> */ var taskModuleLink = MSTeamsAdapterConstants.TASK_MODULE_DEEP_LINK+botID+'?url='+MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_EMBED_LINK+youtubeId+'&height='+taskModuleHeight+'&width='+taskModuleWidth;
var youtubeUrl = isVideoTaskModuleEnabled ? taskModuleLink : MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_LINK+youtubeId; var cardData = {}; cardData.messageHeading = header; cardData.imageUrl = imageUrl; cardData.youtubeUrl = youtubeUrl; cardData.description = label; cardData.titleUrl = youtubeUrl; card = adaptiveCardBuilder.getAdaptiveCard(cardData); attachment.setContentType(card.getContentType()); attachment.setContent(card); } else { if(isNonVideoTaskModuleEnabled){ var encodedLink = microsoftTeamsUtil.encodeTaskModuleURL(action); var taskModuleLink = MSTeamsAdapterConstants.TASK_MODULE_DEEP_LINK+botID+'?url='+encodedLink+'&height='+taskModuleHeight+'&width='+taskModuleWidth; action = taskModuleLink; }
if(header) { adaptiveCardBuilder.addBodyBlock(adaptiveCardBuilder.getTextBlock(header, "default", "Bolder")) }
var linkBlock = adaptiveCardBuilder.getLink(label,action,"medium","default"); adaptiveCardBuilder.addBodyBlock(linkBlock); attachment.setContentType(adaptiveCardBuilder.getContentType()); attachment.setContent(adaptiveCardBuilder); } activity.setSummary(header); activity.addAttachment(attachment); activity = activity.build();
outputs.result = activity; } catch(e) { LOGGER.error("Error in default output link outbound transformer : " + e.message); throw e; } })(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable + 1);
var isVideoTaskModuleEnabled = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.view_video_msft_task_module')); var isNonVideoTaskModuleEnabled = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.view_non_video_msft_task_module')); var isXframeEnabled = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('glide.set_x_frame_options')); var taskModuleHeight = gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.msft_task_module_height'); var taskModuleWidth = gs.getProperty('sn_va_teams.msft_task_module_width');
var microsoftTeamsUtil = new VAMicrosoftTeamsUtil(); var activity = microsoftTeamsUtil.getOutboundActivity(payload); var attachment = new sn_va_teams.MSTeamsActivityAttachmentBuilder(); var adaptiveCardBuilder = new sn_va_teams.MSTeamsAdaptiveCardBuilder(); var card = {}; if (action.includes("youtube")) { var youtubeId = action.substring(action.indexOf("?v=")+3); var imageUrl = MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_IMAGE_LINK+youtubeId+MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_IMAGE_RESOLUTION;

var youtubeUrl = isVideoTaskModuleEnabled ? taskModuleLink : MSTeamsAdapterConstants.YOUTUBE_LINK+youtubeId; var cardData = {}; cardData.messageHeading = header; cardData.imageUrl = imageUrl; cardData.youtubeUrl = youtubeUrl; cardData.description = label; cardData.titleUrl = youtubeUrl; card = adaptiveCardBuilder.getAdaptiveCard(cardData); attachment.setContentType(card.getContentType()); attachment.setContent(card); } else { if(isNonVideoTaskModuleEnabled){ var encodedLink = microsoftTeamsUtil.encodeTaskModuleURL(action); var taskModuleLink = MSTeamsAdapterConstants.TASK_MODULE_DEEP_LINK+botID+'?url='+encodedLink+'&height='+taskModuleHeight+'&width='+taskModuleWidth; action = taskModuleLink; }
if(header) { adaptiveCardBuilder.addBodyBlock(adaptiveCardBuilder.getTextBlock(header, "default", "Bolder")) }
var linkBlock = adaptiveCardBuilder.getLink(label,action,"medium","default"); adaptiveCardBuilder.addBodyBlock(linkBlock); attachment.setContentType(adaptiveCardBuilder.getContentType()); attachment.setContent(adaptiveCardBuilder); } activity.setSummary(header); activity.addAttachment(attachment); activity = activity.build();
outputs.result = activity; } catch(e) { LOGGER.error("Error in default output link outbound transformer : " + e.message); throw e; } })(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable
